title: First and Last: A Short Story Collection
description: A woman's moment of triumph comes as she says goodbye to her lover.A women's book club learns about the hot new man in town.Hidden truths rest inside empty frames.Are talents worth anything if you don't make money with them?A man signs up for night school to keep tabs on his sister's boyfriend.A daughter moves on....In First and Last, author Virginia Spotts explores moments of connection and disconnection, loss, love, beginnings, and endings. This collection of original stories includes competition winners and personal favorites of the author, published for the first time.
author: Virginia Spotts
